title: Crazy Karts
description:
Did you know that most Formula 1 drivers started their careers with Karting?  These tiny four-wheeled machines can reach speeds of up to 100 mph. Â 
Even though karting is an adrenaline-pumping experience as you drive a lightweight vehicle on a crazy circuit, drivers are open to many safety risks.  That's why we bring this experience to the virtual realm.
